title: Schola
credit_line: Gift of Henry Oliver III and Charles Oliver II
provenance_text:
Acquired by William Frew, 1928; by descent to Emily Oliver, daughter of previous [1910-2010], Sewickley, PA, until 2010; Estate of Emily Oliver, 2010. Henry Oliver III, by 2011. Gift to Museum, 2011.

Under review by CGK

creator.birth_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
